comment.author: 60302515@N05
comment._content: Cecil John Rhodes after whom the Rhodesians were named did try to nab Bechuanaland  but the chiefs their had already petitioned for, and received British Protectorate status - Queen Victoria being very impressed with their quest to make their country alcohol free!  Thus Rhodes was thwarted in this instance and Bechuanaland never became part of the Rhodesias!  Luck Setswana!
